reviewTitle: Wine Tasting, Cooking Class and Dinner
review_details: My wife and I had a wine tasting and cooking class with Talia and the next day went back for dinner. Both trips to Aroma Avlis were wonderful! For the cooking class and wine tasting, it was very personal and the staff assisting were friendly, helpful and a pleasure to work with. And the food we cooked tasted great. For dinner, the food was phenomenal and the staff truly made an effort to make dinner a great experience. Would truly recommend to anyone!
